item.title: Council bin truck has broken branch off tree, 10th January
item.description:
A council bin truck has driven into a tree overhanging the road and broken a large branch off. The branch was overhanging the pavement causing an obstruction and has been pulled off the tree and placed onto private land to the left of 85 Eden Way. It needs to be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Way, Eden Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3rd lamp post along alley not working, 10th January
item.description:
The lamp post has not been working and I have already reported this over 4 weeks ago , access the alley from Wansunt/ St Marys Road Bexley, it is the 3rd lamp post along. This causes an area of darkness and concern for health and safety, especially in an alley
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dukes Orchard, Coldblow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Human poo, 10th January
item.description:
Somebody has defecated in our courtyard just off the street… it’s massive and a bit runny. Potentially public health risk if it washes down

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shakspeare Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large red van has been parked without moving for at least two months on Dovercourt Road North SE22, 10th January
item.description:
This van which is taxed and has MOT has been parked at the south end of Dovercourt Road for at least two months without moving. A photo taken today shows inside the cab has mould on the steering wheel and seats. Parking in this narrow residential road is always difficult as it is used as a car park by Alleyn’s School. Often there are few passing spaces. The van is close to the entrance of the road from Woodwarde and where it is difficult to see traffic approaching because of a bend in the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dovercourt Road, Dulwich Village, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: EXTREME DANGER! 50×40 cm Hole on the street filled with water!, 10th January
item.description:
A cyclist broke her nose from a fall and locals say people keep getting injured. FIX URGENTLY OR PEOPLE MIGHT DIE if they fall and a car passes by. THE HOLE IS NOT SIGNALLED!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Essex Road, Islington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post that stops parking is falling down, 10th January
item.description:
